modName: IPM - Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw - Light Enchanting Disenchant
summary: Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw Light, Cloth, Enchanting and Disenchant version
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][size=3]Other user's assets.
All assets in this mod belong to [font=Verdana][size=3]PrivateEye[/size][/font].

[size=4][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30069]Detailed description of the modification on the original creator page.[/url][/b][/size]

I'm just made Light, Cloth, Enchanting and Disenchant version.
I know that the light or Cloth version does not correspond to the lore.
(really like use modifications according to lore, but for Helm of Bearclaw Oreyn I'm willing to make an exception because of my character Light Armor)

Installer compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840]Wrye Bash[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager]NMM[/url].

[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][color=#cc0000][b][size=4][color=#ff0000]Installer includes only ESP file meshes and textures files must be downloaded[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30069]from author page.[/url][/size][/b]
[/color]
[color=#FF9900]If you like what I did, go back and support.
This is the best way to thank me for my work.
And remember also [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30069]about author of the original mod[/url].[/color]

[size=4][b][color=#FF9900]My other modifications.[/color][/b][/size]
[font=Verdana][size=3][font=Verdana][size=3][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50737/?][b][/b][/url][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50737/?]Insane Armory - Archery Bows and Crossbows[/url]
[/b][b][font=Verdana][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67828/?] Insane Armory - Shields[/url][/font][/b][/size][/size][/font][b]
[font=Verdana][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30282/?]Scoia'tael Bows[/url][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50857/?]Insane Alchemy - Â Potions Poisons and Others High Polygons Bottles[/url]
[/b][/size][/font][b][font=Verdana][font=Verdana][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29818/?]Conan Sword Fix[/url][/font][/font][/b]

[size=4][b][color=#FF9900]Credits[/color][/b][/size]

[font=Verdana][size=3][b][url=http://bethsoft.com/en-gb]Bethesda[/url] [color=#e69138]for creating games that can be modified.
>>> Unfortunately, this is becoming less common practice. <<<
>>> And instead, we get... ( Better to "create" next DLC ) <<<[/color]
[/b][/size][/font]PrivateEye for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30069]Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859]xEdit[/url] great tool.
[/size][/font][/center]

[center][size=3][color=#c80000][b]You CAN NOT use anything from My modification on website that makes money directly or through advertising.
>>> The only exception is www.nexusmods.com <<<
You CAN NOT use anything from My modification on Steam Workshop or Bethesda.net.[/b][/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#006400][b]In other cases for permission ask via PM.[/b][/color][/size][/center]
author: InsanePlumber
